videos.title: Why Do Trans-sylvania Gravel Epic?
videos.description:
Riders at the 2022 edition of Trans-sylania Gravel Epic in central Pennsylvania talk about their favorite parts of the 4 day gravel stage race. 

https://www.tsegravel.com/
videos.transcript:
foreign
[Music]
I just think these gravel camping events
are so awesome and this is no different
like like we race hard when from start
to finish but like once we cross the
line like the vibe totally changes and
it's just hanging out around the
campsite playing guitar on the campfire
having s'mores and stuff and just having
fun with your friends so I think that's
what sets these events apart like this
is just a really cool like Road doesn't
have things like this that you know I
see that the mountain bike culture and
like I cannot ride off-road for beans
but like I want that I want to be able
to
um and so that that's also like really
cool to be able to have that Vibe
experience that Vibe I know it's not
quite there with gravel like we Roadies
are contaminating it with our like
uptightness but
yeah I like the vibe too so fun fun time
just hanging out with fast people riding
bikes
um I really I really like finding a
group like the group that keep ending up
with like it was great fun like being
with the same group of people for
the better part of three and a half days
the camaraderie is really really cool
everybody's out there her and but you're

sorry no next week I like just like you

you know like popping in

immersion gravel
I loved it
yeah if you haven't heard of the

videos.title: Trans-Sylvania Gravel Epic 2023 Stage 1 Vlog
videos.description:
The TSE Gravel Stage Race is a 4 day race out of the Seven Mountain Scout Camp, east of State College Pa. We rip through Rothrock, Bald Eagle, Penn Rosevelt, and Poe Paddy State Parks. The gravel road network in this area is legendary and this race is a real treat!

Flow formulas
https://flowformulas.com/kerry2023

These videos take a lot of  time to make and sometimes the adventures are expensive. If you feel like donating to encourage/help me offset costs, THANKYOU! Your contribution is greatly appreciated and gives me the resources to provide y'all more content. 
Venmo: www.venmo.com/u/Kerry-Werner-1
paypal: https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/kerrywerner

https://bike.shimano.com/en-US/home.html
https://www.konaworld.com
https://www.maxxis.com/tires/bicycle
